content: A mixture of APhMDPH4 (0.0667 g, 0.25 mmol), ZnO (0.0101 g, 0.125 mmol), 2,2′-bipy (0.0195 g, 0.125 mmol) and distilled water (1 mL) was sealed in a small centrifuge tube, heated and then preserved at 80 °C for 3 days. Colorless crystals of 1 for single crystal diffraction analysis were obtained. Yield: 88% (based on ZnO). Elemental analysis: Found, %: C 35.91, H 4.31, N 5.78, Calcd. for C58H84N8O38P8Zn3: C 35.81, H 4.35, N 5.76. IR (KBr pellet, ν in cm−1, intensity): 3411s (ν O–H), 1636m (δ H–O–H), 1599m, 1578m, 1493m, 1474m, 1444m, 1401m, 1317m, 1259s (ν P=O), 1232s (ν P=O), 1157m, 1090s (ν P=O), 1056m, 923s (ν P–O–P), 869m, 773m, 734m, 696m, 652m, 587m, 533m, 685m.
clean_text:
Synthesis of Zn3(L1H)2(2,2'-bipy)3 ⋅ 18H2O (1)

A mixture of APhMDPH4 (0.0667 g, 0.25 mmol), ZnO (0.0101 g, 0.125 mmol), 2,2'-bipy (0.0195 g, 0.125 mmol) and distilled water (1 mL) was sealed in a small centrifuge tube, heated and then preserved at 80 °C for 3 days. Colorless crystals of 1 for single crystal diffraction analysis were obtained. Yield: 88% (based on ZnO). Elemental analysis: Found, %: C 35.91, H 4.31, N 5.78, Calcd. for C58H84N8O38P8Zn3: C 35.81, H 4.35, N 5.76. IR (KBr pellet, ν in cm-1, intensity): 3411s (ν O-H), 1636m (δ H-O-H), 1599m, 1578m, 1493m, 1474m, 1444m, 1401m, 1317m, 1259s (ν P=O), 1232s (ν P=O), 1157m, 1090s (ν P=O), 1056m, 923s (ν P-O-P), 869m, 773m, 734m, 696m, 652m, 587m, 533m, 685m.
